ApiKeys.title: API Keys
ApiKeys.description: Manage API keys for external integrations
ApiKeys.createDescription: Generate a new API key for your applications
ApiKeys.securityMessage: API keys provide direct access to your data. Keep them secure and never share them publicly.
ApiKeys.name: Name
ApiKeys.descriptionPlaceholder: What will this key be used for?
ApiKeys.keyCreatedDescription: Your new API key has been generated
ApiKeys.saveKeyMessage: This is the only time you will see this key. Copy it now and store it securely.
ApiKeys.keyRevoked: API key has been revoked and can no longer be used
ApiKeys.keyDeleted: API key has been permanently deleted
